#include <iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	// find the number of squares of less than the given number
	// if even, then square numbers wil be on
	// else num  - no. of squares
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		long int n;
		cin>>n;
		
		long int cnt= floor(sqrt((double)n));
		
		if(n%2==0){
			cout<<cnt<<endl;
		}
		else
		cout<<(n-cnt)<<endl;
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
